location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省南京市、苏州市
location.en: Nanjing and Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市和苏州市的研究型综合大学。是“双一流A类”、原“985工程”、原“211工程”重点建设大学，九校联盟成员。
description.en: A research-oriented comprehensive university located in Nanjing and Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, China. It is a 'Double First-Class' (Class A), former 'Project 985', and former 'Project 211' key university, and a member of the C9 League.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院院士，气象学家，现任南京大学校长。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, meteorologist, and the current president of Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院院士，模式识别与计算机视觉专家，现任南京大学党委书记。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, an expert in pattern recognition and computer vision, and the current Party Committee Secretary of Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 南京大学的前身之一，中华民国时期中国最高学府。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Nanjing University, the highest institution of learning in China during the Republic of China era.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国南京市

description.zh-cn: 南京大学的前身，由国立中央大学于1949年更名而来。
description.en: The predecessor of Nanjing University, renamed from National Central University in 1949.

zh-cn: 五二零“反饥饿、反内战、反迫害”学运

description.zh-cn: 1947年爆发的以国立中央大学和金陵大学学生为主体的学生运动。
description.en: A student movement that broke out in 1947, primarily involving students from National Central University and the University of Nanking.

description.zh-cn: 存在于1888年至1952年的教会大学，其文理学院在1952年院系调整中并入南京大学。
description.en: A private Christian university that existed from 1888 to 1952. Its College of Arts and Sciences was merged into Nanjing University during the 1952 institutional reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 南京大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 中国艺术家、教育家、思想家、革新家，现代中国音乐界一代宗师。
description.en: A Chinese artist, educator, thinker, and innovator, a master of modern Chinese music.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，南京高等师范学校首任校长。
description.en: A Chinese educator and the first president of Nanjing Higher Normal School.

nodes.id: 南京高等师范学校校歌

zh-cn: 南京高等师范学校校歌

description.zh-cn: 南京大学历史上最早的校歌，由江谦作词，李叔同制谱。
description.en: The earliest school song in the history of Nanjing University, with lyrics by Jiang Qian and music by Li Shutong.

description.zh-cn: 德国前总理。
description.en: Former Chancellor of Germany.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in the United States.

nodes.id: 南京大学-约翰斯·霍普金斯大学中美文化研究中心

zh-cn: 南京大学-约翰斯·霍普金斯大学中美文化研究中心

description.zh-cn: 由南京大学和美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学共同创办的高等教育国际合作项目。
description.en: An international higher education cooperation program jointly established by Nanjing University and Johns Hopkins University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

description.zh-cn: 谈哲敏自2023年4月起担任南京大学校长。
description.en: Tan Zhemin has been the president of Nanjing University since April 2023.

description.zh-cn: 谭铁牛担任南京大学党委书记。
description.en: Tan Tieniu serves as the Party Committee Secretary of Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中华人民共和国成立前夕，国立中央大学更名为国立南京大学。
description.en: On the eve of the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, National Central University was renamed National Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 1950年10月，国立南京大学去除“国立”二字，径称“南京大学”。
description.en: In October 1950, National Nanjing University dropped the 'National' prefix and was simply called 'Nanjing University'.

description.zh-cn: 南京大学将校庆日定为5月20日，以纪念1947年爆发的五二零运动。
description.en: Nanjing University set its anniversary to May 20 to commemorate the May 20th Movement of 1947.

description.zh-cn: 国立中央大学的学生是五二零运动的主体之一。
description.en: Students from National Central University were one of the main groups in the May 20th Movement.

description.zh-cn: 金陵大学的学生是五二零运动的主体之一。
description.en: Students from the University of Nanking were one of the main groups in the May 20th Movement.

relationships.target: 南京高等师范学校校歌

description.zh-cn: 为南京高等师范学校校歌制谱。
description.en: Composed the music for the Nanjing Higher Normal School anthem.

relationships.target: 南京高等师范学校校歌

description.zh-cn: 为南京高等师范学校校歌作词。
description.en: Wrote the lyrics for the Nanjing Higher Normal School anthem.

description.zh-cn: 江谦是南京高等师范学校首任校长。
description.en: Jiang Qian was the first president of Nanjing Higher Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 南京大学授予德国前总理默克尔名誉博士学位。
description.en: Nanjing University conferred an honorary doctorate upon former German Chancellor Angela Merkel.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民被列为南京大学校友。
description.en: Jiang Zemin is listed as an alumnus of Nanjing University.

relationships.target: 南京大学-约翰斯·霍普金斯大学中美文化研究中心

description.zh-cn: 南京大学与约翰斯·霍普金斯大学于20世纪80年代共同创办了中美文化研究中心。
description.en: Nanjing University and Johns Hopkins University jointly founded the HNC Center for Chinese and American Studies in the 1980s.

relationships.target: 南京大学-约翰斯·霍普金斯大学中美文化研究中心

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学与南京大学于20世纪80年代共同创办了中美文化研究中心。
description.en: Johns Hopkins University and Nanjing University jointly founded the HNC Center for Chinese and American Studies in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 南京大学与约翰斯·霍普金斯大学是长期合作伙伴，共同创办了中美文化研究中心。
description.en: Nanjing University and Johns Hopkins University are long-term partners, having jointly established the HNC Center for Chinese and American Studies.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 南京大学是中华人民共和国教育部直属大学。
description.en: Nanjing University is a university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.
